alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antioch, or 7 miles west of Brundidge, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Rucker, Ozark, Ariton, Java, Chestnut Grove, Greater Salem Church, Skipperville, Dill, Victoria, Frisco, Roberts Crossroads, Eanon, Wilkinstown, Rocky Head, Arguta, Beamon, Roeton, Dale County Lake, Marley Hill and Clowers Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
